alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Golden Gate Estates, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Golden Gate Estates, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Picayune Strand State Forest, South Blocks Golde and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
